articles.title: December retail sales slide 1.9% amid shortages, omicron - Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Americans, beset by lack of product choices, rising prices and the arrival of omicron, sharply cut their spending in December after a burst of early buying in the fall boosted this year's holiday shopping season.

articles.title: 19 states have fewer than 15% of ICU beds left as health care staffing shortages complicate care - CNN
